post:
Hello,

We are proud to add a new service to our Company Portfolio. NAT VPS with EPYC CPU, NVMe RAID-10 disks, which offers amazing performance at a competitive price; perfect for your PROJECTS.
<center>
Available Locations
## New York City, USA 🇺🇸 - AMD EPYC 7302p with NVMe in RAID10
## Amsterdam, NL 🇳🇱 - AMD EPYC 7302p with NVMe in RAID10
## Singapore 🇸🇬 - AMD EPYC 7302p with NVMe in RAID10
<br>
</center>

-------------------------------------------------------------

**3 x 256MB Bundle -** We are doing a bundle deal as our first official offering on LET, available for first 10 orders only.
_At a special price of just £4.4/location/**year** each VPS gets:-_

> * 1 CPU Core EPYC 7302p@3.0GHz
> * 4GB NVMe Raid-10 Disk Space
> * 256MB ECC Ram
> * 500 GB Transfer p/Month @ 1gbit
> * 1 x dedicated IPv6 (Unlimited free via ticket)
> * 1 x NAT IPv4 - 20 IPv4 ports + 1 SSH port
> * Domain forwarding (Host website on IPv4)

Order Link: https://webhorizon.in/clients/order/main/index/nat
<br>
You get a VPS in all 3 locations: 
1x New York City, USA 🇺🇸
1x Amsterdam, NL 🇳🇱
1x Singapore 🇸🇬 
<br>
**Some Highlights**:
Virtualizor Control Panel with HAPROXY on port 80 & 443 (can be managed from Service Dashboard)
More CPU Power - EPYC 7302p CPU's @ 3.0GHz
Faster Disk Speeds - NVMe SSD's in RAID-10
Weekly Provider-side Backups 
Snappier experience - DDR4 ECC Ram
Not Oversold - You can use all of your allotted resources anytime
Limited time prices - You will be grandfathered (your service price will not be increased) if we ever increase prices.

> Have low budget-purpose? Buy a single location at just £5.5/yr. https://webhorizon.in/clients/order/main/index/nat
<br>
**Common Uses** :-

* Free HA setup using Cloudflare/ArvanCloud and round-robin DNS (i'm not affiliated with them)
* Teamspeak Servers
* VPN Servers
* Proxy Servers
* Web Servers
* Distributed database
* Scrapers
* IRC clients (IPv6 only)
* Many others uses..


**Looking Glass** :- 

* Singapore - http://sgp.lg.webhorizon.in
* Amsterdam, NL - http://ams.lg.webhorizon.in
* New York City, USA - Test IP: 23.227.207.82

Uptime Reports: https://status.webhorizon.in
<br>

**Notes**:- 

1. All services will be provisioned within 12 hours
2. All services are OpenVZ7 Based
3. You can use all of your resources anytime, however CPU is **fair share** , abusing may cause your VPS to be shutdown. You will be given 2 chances to reduce your CPU abuse, or else your service maybe suspended. This is done to maintain the service quality for all users.
<br>

**Payment Methods**:-

* PayPal Payments
* Cards via Stripe Payments
* Indian Payment methods

<br>

Terms: https://webhorizon.in/tos.html ; don't do anything that will get you or me in trouble.

Contact E-mail: helpdesk @ webhorizon.in

If you have any questions or are looking for something custom, send a PM or post here.
<br>
Thanks for reading & regards,
[WebHorizon](https://webhorizon.in "WebHorizon")
